summary:
*Body/Face/Hair/Ect. included in this mod, no other mods req'd*

Adds Juliette, a Breton Ranger, to Dragonsreach. She is a strong and beautiful adventurer, and will jump at the opportunity to accompany the Dovahkiin, or marry him/her, for that matter.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod's page.

My custom work will continue as planned.

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don't know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I'll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/21AOk.png[/img]

She is located in the main part of Dragonsreach, normally stuffing her face! She is marked essential and you can also marry her.

Min Level: 10 Max Level: 90
Health: 240 Magicka: 150 Stamina: [/b]295
Class: Combat Ranger
Best Skills: One Handed, Two Handed, Block, Archery, Light Armor, Sneak
Inventory: Hide Shield, Steel Mace, Hunting Bow, 100 Steel Arrows
Spells: Healing, Fast Healing
Perks: Armsman (3), Overdraw (3), Lightfoot, Unhindered, Paralyzing Strike, Muffled Movement, Agile Defender (3), Custom Fit, Matching Set, Critical Shot, Hunters Discipline, Ranger

Thank you Hodilton for the video!! (Juliette is featured around 1:11):
[youtube]qjGDmRp7-HY[/youtube]

And another big thank you to Insane0hFlex:
[youtube]xO96h_UE1A8[/youtube]

Installation: Use NMM, or merge the Data folder included with the one located in your skyrim directory.

Uninstallation: Deactivate and delete Juliette.esp and the following folders in skyrim/data/
meshes/actors/character/colette (I was going to name her Colette but then I rememebered there was one in the vanilla game, derp!)
meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facegeom/juliette.esp
textures/actors/character/colette
meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/juliette.esp

Credits:

NOTE: These mods are not required for Juliette to look like she does in the screenshots, but I do ask that if you really like me that you'll visit these mods pages and consider DLing and endorsing, or simply letting the author know you appreciate their work! They are the magic behind Juliette, not me!

Coverwomen Brows - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563
Oblivion Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598
ZZjays AMAZING new "Women of Skyrim" face texture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25588
Navetsea Skin textures - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554
Better Freckles - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4502
Caliente for CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
The Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Notes: I made this girl for myself after trying out zzjay's face texture this morning. Juliette's not going to have all the body options/patches my other followers do unless I'm asked specifically to release them, she was just for fun. Thus the lackluster description. Also, I use the UNP body, but after doing CBBE patches for my other followers, I decided I wanted a girl in my game to have CBBE, it really makes her stand out!

Every DL, Endorsement and Comment means the world to me! Thank you!
author: Natilde
